item.title: Michelle add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Today was good. Today was fun. Tomorrow is another one." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Josh Billings
item.description: "A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than he loves himself." -- Josh Billings

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Roger Caras
item.description: "Dogs have given us their absolute all. We are the center of their universe. We are the focus of their love and faith and trust. They serve us in return for scraps. It is without a doubt the best deal man has ever made. " -- Roger Caras

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Jane Brody
item.description: "Real luxury is time and opportunity to read for pleasure." -- Jane Brody

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Michelle add a quote by B.B. King
item.description: "The beautiful thing about learning is that nobody can take it away from you." -- B.B. King

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "Literature is my Utopia" -- Helen Keller

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "I long to accomplish a great and noble task, but it is my chief duty to accomplish small tasks as if they were great and noble." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "What we once enjoyed and deeply loved we can never lose, For all that we love deeply becomes a part of us." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "My friends have made the story of my life." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Anthony Trollope
item.description: "That I can read and be happy while I am reading, is a great blessing." -- Anthony Trollope

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description:
"Beer is proof that God loves us and wants us to be happy.
[misquote of a letter about wine, see quotes/831031]" -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "You is kind. You is smart. You is important." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "I always thought insanity would be a dark, bitter feeling, but it is drenching and delicious if you really roll around in it." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Michelle add a quote by haruki murakami
item.description: "Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional." -- haruki murakami

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Sam Levenson
item.description: "For Attractive lips, speak words of kindness. &emsp;For lovely eyes, seek out the good in people. &emsp;For a slim figure, share your food with the hungry. &emsp;For beautiful hair, let a child run their fingers through it once a day. &emsp;For poise, walk with the knowledge that you never walk alone. &emsp;People, more than things, have to be restored, renewed, revived, reclaimed, and redeemed. Remember, if you ever need a helping hand, you will find one at the end of each of your arms. &emsp;As you grow older, you will discover that you have two hands, one for helping yourself and the other for helping others." -- Sam Levenson

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Sometimes I wonder whether the world is being run by smart people who are putting us on or by imbeciles who really mean it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Michelle add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Books are the ultimate Dumpees: put them down and they’ll wait for you forever; pay attention to them and they always love you back." -- John Green

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no friend as loyal as a book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I cannot live without books." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "So, please, oh please, we beg, we pray, go throw your TV set away, and in its place you can install, a lovely bookcase on the wall." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Sophocles
item.description: "One word Frees us of all the weight and pain of life: That word is love." -- Sophocles

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Happiness is a warm puppy." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Dogs are our link to paradise. They don't know evil or jealousy or discontent. To sit with a dog on a hillside on a glorious afternoon is to be back in Eden, where doing nothing was not boring--it was peace." -- Milan Kundera
